casebody.data:
IMES
v.
ASHEVILLE. No. 250A04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 27, 2004. Fred T. Hamlet, Greensboro, for CCL Mgt. and Asheville City Coach. Curtis W. Euler, Asheville, for City of Asheville.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 26th day of May 2004 by Plaintiff Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Plaintiff (James Edward Imes) shall have up to and including the 20th day of August 2004 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 27th day of May 2004."

*385
